definition: to face/to overlook/to arrive/to be (just) about to/just before

sentences.english: He had laughed at those who died with prayers on their lips.
sentences.chinese: 他曾嘲笑過那些臨刑前還在唸念有詞地做着禱告的人。

sentences.english: Roger in his pre-sentence before execution so that people are flocking towards the sea.
sentences.chinese: 羅傑，他在臨刑前的一句話讓人們趨之若鶩奔向大海。

sentences.english: He told the officials at the execution to observe Wang's words and deeds very carefully.
sentences.chinese: 他叮囑監斬官們仔細觀察王臨刑的言行。

sentences.english: Die of blade etc. Get there in time.
sentences.chinese: 臨刑之際，刀鋒等人及時趕到。
